name: Sabotage (unrealnirvana)
description: The game is in a big metro station which has metro passing around all time. It is a 2 player co-op gameplay in a horizontal split screen. Players use grenade launchers to destroy attacking enemies or blow yourself away to safety which will not affect your health. While enemies are flying and ground robots where flying enemies are in flock. Players can use walls to block enemies at exits of the metro , walls can be found in travelling metro cars. If the player stays in the metro after doors are closed, The Round will be reloaded.
